name: Bunphony
description:
Submission for the Mini Jame Gam 10! A cute game about a bunny trying to get their phone back! Controls:
  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to aim and LMB to shoot.
  • Space to advance dialogue.
Item Drops:

Rapid Shot: Makes bunny shoot carrots for a shot time.
Big Shot: Makes bunny shoot bigger carrots for a short time.
Shield: Creates a bubble barrier on the bunny that prevents all damage for a short time.
HP boost: Recovers HP.
